title: Login page not loading
description: The login page remains blank on initial load for some users.

title: Report generation fails
description: Generating reports results in an error for data sets larger than 1,000 items.

title: Email notifications not being sent
description: Users are not receiving email notifications for updates on their submitted bugs.

title: User profile image upload error
description: Uploading a profile image fails intermittently for some users.
